mdRecord.dcterms:title: Watson/Fine Building Esplanade, general view

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Esplanade, lawn, and flowers at the Watson Fine Buildings

"The Esplanades or walkways on the Florida Southern Campus were built at various times between 1946 and 1958. These walkways connect the many buildings designed by Frank Lloyd Wright for the campus he called Child of the Sun." --http://wjmphotography.us/?p=2508 [work]

The Watson/Fine Buildings house the Alumni Office, President's Conference Room, President's Office, Advancement Offices, Vice President of Advancement's Office. --http://www.flsouthern.edu/map.aspx [work]
